name: jquery-csv
description: A jQuery CSV parser plugin. Battle Tested | Optimized | 100% IETF RFC 4180 Complete

scripts.clean: npm run htmlhint && npm run semistandard
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run minify && git commit -a -m 'Update minified version'
scripts.prepublish: npm run htmlhint && npm run semistandard && npm run test
